base__title.value: Hello, my name is Liam Goldfinch.

resolvedData.html:
I currently work as a .NET developer for the digital web agency NetConstruct.

We specialise in building websites for both Kentico and Umbraco CMS platforms.

I am a certified developer for Kentico CMS/EMS and Kentico Kontent, and an active member of the Kentico open source community.

This website has been built using Kentico Kontent (Content as a Service CMS) and gatsby.js (static site generator).

Content updates are pushed through an Azure function, which triggers a GitHub Action to recompile the site and publish the updated static site to GitHub Pages.
